title: [CLIENT/CRASH] Client Crash
body:
{{champion:267}} So....

my client just crashed in champ select.

champ select for my last game of promotion series.

counts as a dodge.

lose promo series.

**Can Riot please explain to me what they are doing to solve the bugs and issues with their client? **This has been happening for FAR too long. 

Client just stopped functioning, froze, and exited out. Rest of my internet/computer/everything else is functioning fine. 100% client-side issue.

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Still no Riot posts on anyone's issues...what's going on? Or is this the norm, and I just don't know because I've never posted a problem here.
{{champion:267}} literally no Riot posts here except from days ago =/ wtf
